trans-unit.source: The base TextControl class is an abstract class from which concrete text-based controls are derived.
trans-unit.target: TextControl 基类是从中派生具体基于文本的控件的一个抽象类。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextBox>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Label>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Link>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> controls are examples of controls derived from the TextControl class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextBox>， <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Label>， <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Link>，并且<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>控件的控件派生自 TextControl 类示例</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Link></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Label></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Every control that is based on the TextControl class has a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property, which can be programmatically modified.
trans-unit.target: 基于 TextControl 类的每个控件具有<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>属性，可以以编程方式修改。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property is usually used to render the control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl"></xref> class.

trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: Sets or returns the text for the control.
trans-unit.target: 设置或返回控件的文本。
此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: For an object that inherits the Text property from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl> class, this property renders the text of the control.
trans-unit.target: 对象继承来自的文本属性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl>类，此属性呈现控件的文本。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl>

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
The Text property can be specified by using the Text attribute, or as inner text.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过使用文本属性，或为内部文本指定文本属性。

trans-unit.source: If the Text property is specified in both ways, the inner text always takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果这两种方式中指定的文本属性，则内部文本始终优先。

trans-unit.source: However, if the Text property is programmatically set, the inner text is automatically removed and the newly set property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果以编程方式设置文本属性，则内部文本将会自动删除，并且已设置新属性优先。
